title: Bug 124066 - Insert chart not translated into Chinese in context menu
description: Bug 124066 - In the context menu, the option 'Insert chart' is not translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout, the context menu appears. The 'Insert chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
EB: When right-clicking in the layout, the context menu should appear with the 'Insert chart' option translated into Chinese.
SR:
1. Open the software and navigate to the layout.
2. Right-click in the layout to bring up the context menu.
3. Observe that the option 'Insert chart' is not translated into Chinese.
